name: Planet Defender (itch) (blazar1)
description:
This is a simple survival game I created in Godot. Have fun!

Controls (changeable in settings):

W  /  ClickShoot from tank
A, D  /  Move mouse + hold clickMove tank
1Buy tank
2Buy turret
3Buy terraformer (heals planet & acts as health buffer)
SpaceToggle tactical pause (No menu)
EscToggle pause (With menu)
